title: Churchill: voice of a lion
creator_credit: Don Thompson, New York Times Productions and Nielsen-Ferns
brief_description: After a brief resume of his early life this film examines Churchill’s role in the Second World War. It provides footage of his meetings with Stalin and Roosevelt and his visits to the front and is mostly concerned with his leading of the British to victory in the War. Narrated by Henry Fonda. Suitable for upper secondary level.
